/privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy, Missing Piece – Modern Wedding Website Invites
/privacy-policy.description: Create a beautiful wedding invite that opens as a website. Edit anytime and share instantly on WhatsApp. Modern, simple, and made for every ceremony.
h1: Privacy policy, Terms & Conditions and Refund Policy

Entity: Blue Beryl EnterpriseBrand: Missing PieceTrademark: The “Missing Piece” logo is a registered trademark and proprietary design protected under the Indian Copyright Act, 1957, and the Trademarks Act, 1999. Unauthorized use—digital or physical—will result in legal action under Delhi jurisdiction.
All templates, designs, illustrations, and digital assets on this website are the exclusive intellectual property of Blue Beryl Enterprise. They are protected under:
Any attempt to copy, resell, modify, distribute, reverse engineer, or share templates—within India or abroad—will result in:
All disputes fall under the exclusive jurisdiction of Delhi, India.
We collect only essential information required for order processing:
Payment information (processed securely via Razorpay for INR + USD transactions)
Country information (for currency, invoicing, and compliance)
We do not collect cookies, trackers, browsing history, or unnecessary personal data.
Your data is used strictly to:
Process INR and USD payments through Razorpay
Deliver your purchased digital wedding invite templates
Comply with Indian and international legal, tax, and anti-fraud requirements
We never sell, rent, or share your personal data for advertising or marketing.
Payments are processed securely through Razorpay, compliant with PCI-DSS, RBI norms, and international payment regulations.
Razorpay supports INR, USD, and globally accepted payment methods.
Blue Beryl Enterprise does not store your card or banking details.
International buyers may be required to provide billing country information as per global card-network rules.
You receive a non-exclusive, non-transferable, single-use license.
The template may be edited and used for one personal wedding or private event.
You may not resell, redistribute, sublicense, or use it for commercial purposes or for multiple events.
Any unauthorized duplication or sharing—free or paid—will trigger immediate legal action.
By purchasing or using our templates, you agree to the following:
All products are digital and delivered online.
Template access is provided immediately after successful payment.
Delivery is via email or direct download link.
You must provide accurate information during checkout.
You are responsible for maintaining confidentiality of your template link and files.
You may not claim ownership or authorship of any template or design created by Blue Beryl Enterprise.
Selling or transferring your template license
Using templates for business, agency, or client work without written permission
Uploading templates to public platforms for redistribution
We are not liable for downtime caused by third-party services (Framer, Razorpay, hosting providers).
Because templates are instantly downloadable digital goods:
All sales are final for both INR and USD transactions.
No refunds, cancellations, or exchanges are offered once access is delivered.
A technical error on our side prevents you from accessing the template, and
We fail to resolve the issue within a reasonable timeframe.
Chargebacks for valid purchases will be disputed with full evidence.
Your data is processed only through:
We retain data only as long as required for:
We do not store payment card information.
Under India’s Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023, you may request:
Requests can be made through our contact page.
If you reside in the EU, EEA, or United Kingdom, you have the following rights:
Right to erasure (“Right to be Forgotten”)
Contractual necessity — to deliver your purchased template
Legal obligations — tax, accounting, dispute handling

By purchasing from us, you acknowledge that your data may be processed in India through secure third-party providers (Razorpay, Framer). These services use industry-standard security and data-protection measures.
Blue Beryl Enterprise is not liable for:
Issues caused by third-party platforms (Razorpay, Framer)
Unauthorized use, copying, or redistribution of templates by users
Losses due to user error, misuse, or technical limitations on the user's side
Maximum liability is limited to the amount paid for the template.
This agreement is governed by the laws of India.All disputes—domestic or international—will be resolved exclusively in the courts of Delhi, India.

We may update this combined Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy periodically.The most recent version will always be available on this page.Continued use of the website indicates acceptance of changes.
© Blue Beryl Enterprise. All rights reserved.Unauthorized copying, distribution, or misuse of templates will result in strict civil and criminal legal action under Indian and international laws.
p: Need any help ? We've got your back.

/product-card-laavan.title: Lavaan – Indian Wedding Invitation Website Template
/product-card-laavan.description: A modern wedding invite that opens as a website. Customize instantly, add photos, and share with guests on WhatsApp. Perfect for every ceremony.
h1: What Cards and Video Invites Can’t Do (But These Templates Can)
Don’t Take Our Word for It — Here’s What Real Couples Are Saying
Be the first to know when a new template drops
h2: Inspired by Mussoorie’s Savoy hotel this template is perfect for hill-station weddings—easy to edit, share, and make uniquely yours.
From customizable event cards and RSVP links to smooth animations and elder-friendly design — your wedding template comes packed with every feature to personalize, showcase, and celebrate seamlessly.
See how your invite can go from one-time share to a lasting  experience — without extra cost or hassle.
One link. Endless compliments.
Stay updated on new template and feature releases.
p: Perfect for Anand Karaj-Sikh weddings, Easy to edit, share, and make uniquely yours

Perfect for city, Indian-Hindu weddings. 
Easy to edit, share, and make uniquely yours.
Free tutorial to customize your template with images, text & invite cards.
Invite just the ones you want
Customisable event cards with separate and private pages for bride & groom families.
Want to invite someone only for the pre-wedding? No problem — create custom event combinations with ease
A section to showcase your pre-wedding shoot like never before
Any change? Update anything instantly even after sharing
Guests can RSVP on WhatsApp, open venue location in Google Maps, follow updates on Instagram — all built-in
Elder friendly design. No more squinting at tiny-boring whatsapp videos
Integrated information section: hashtag, parking, staff stay & more
Smooth scroll effects that bring your wedding invite to life
Each design features a Lord Ganesha motif with space for a sacred mantra.
Laptop, Tablet, Phone - Works beautifully on all devices
"We ditched the boring video invite— and our guests couldn’t stop sharing ours"
"Our parents wanted traditional. We wanted modern. This gave us both."
"We thought it’d be complicated. It was easier than ordering food on Zomato."
"We spent less on this template than on one mehendi outfit—and it impressed more people."
"I thought digital meant soulless. I was wrong."
"Finally—an invite people actually remember (and don’t just skip)"
Do I need a software to edit these templates ?
These templates run on Framer and are built to edit as easily as filling out a simple form — most people finish everything in under 10 minutes.
Why this template over a WhatsApp video?
Framer is a free, easy-to-use website builder—no coding needed. Just drag, drop, and publish a stunning site in minutes.
Will this open like a website ?
Yes. Once published your guests will be able to see your invite like a dynamic website: Interactable, complete with links to venue location, RSVP, and wedding Instagram.
What if I want to split guests by event?
The template has an easy provision to create as many event combinations as you need. That way you'll be able to call separate guests to separate events.

We provide an 8 minute+ tutorial video to get you started. In brief - You can start with just a computer. Click the template link in your email after purchase—Then click on the tutorial video link in from the same email and simply follow the steps. Sign up, add your photos and text, and hit publish. It’s all free and fully editable—anytime & anywhere.
How long does it take to edit the invite ?
Editing and sharing is super simple—just like filling a form. Add names, family details, events, photos, and links, and you’re ready to go. Most couples finish in just 10–20 minutes.
What happens after I buy the template?
After you buy a template, you’ll get a “Remix” link by email. Click it to open the template in Framer. Sign up for a free account, and the template will be added to your workspace—ready to customize.

After you buy a template, you’ll get a 'Template' link with a tutorial by email. Click it to open the template in Framer. Sign up for a free account, and the template will be added to your workspace—ready to customize.
Can I purchase now and use it later ?
Yes. You can purchase now and use it anytime in the future.
Can I purchase it using my phone ?
Yes. You can purchase the template from any device and edit it on laptop using the link which will be sent to you on your email.
Will I need to buy a domain name?
Short Answer: No need. Framer gives you a free web link (like awedding.framer.website). But if you want your own .com, that’s optional.
How do I add my details in the template?
Simply follow the step-by-step video guide included with your purchase. In short—click on any text to edit, or on a photo to upload your own. That’s it!
YES - The template allows you to add any music of your choice as an .MP3 file

- Tutorial: Step-by-step video guide for easy editing
- Event Cards: Customisable cards for bride & groom families
- Custom Pages: Separate invite pages for each event
- Photo Highlight: Showcase your pre-wedding shoot beautifully
- Instant Edits: Update anytime, even after sharing
- Smart Links: Built-in RSVP, venue maps & Instagram updates
- Accessibility: Elder-friendly, no tiny text like WhatsApp videos
- Information: Space for hashtag, parking, staff stay & more
- Animations: Smooth scrolling effects to bring invites alive
- God Motif: Lord Ganesha motif with an editable mantra option
- Responsive: Works on laptop, tablet & phone seamlessly
- Music: Upload any muisc of your choice
Do I need to know coding to use this?
Short Answer: Not at all. If you can use Canva or Instagram, you’ll find Framer as easy.
How do I share this with my guests?
Short Answer: Once done, you get a simple link. Share it on WhatsApp, text, email — anything works.
How do my guests view the invite?
Like they view any website—on their browser, Chrome or whatever. It opens beautifully like a website on any device.
What if you want to invite someone to just one event?
The template comes with separate invites for each event—so if you only want to invite your distant bua to the Engagement and not to the Wedding, you absolutely can!
Can I preview before I share it?
Short Answer: Yes! Framer lets you preview everything on mobile and desktop before going live.
Can I make changes after sharing?
Short Answer: Absolutely. Change anything — venue, timings, any link — even after it’s published, and it updates for everyone instantly, no need to re-share the invite.
No - We don’t make custom invites. Please tap the link in bio to buy a template of your choice.

Because this is a digital product, all sales are final and non-refundable. Please review the details carefully before purchasing. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us before placing your order.
Need any help ? We've got your back.

/about-page.title: About Missing Piece – Modern Wedding Website Invites
/about-page.description: We create modern website-style wedding invites built for today. Elegant designs, smart links, and effortless WhatsApp sharing for every guest.
h1: Planning a wedding can often feel overwhelming. Sometimes you’ve chosen the outfits, booked the venue, and finalized the rituals, yet something still feels incomplete. You want a way to bring your love story alive, to share every detail with grace, or maybe you just want to add that final touch of magic. You feel like you have everything in hand but the heart of it is missing… A digital invite that reflects your journey, crafted with care, beauty, and respect for your time and money. That’s where Missing Piece steps in — to complete your puzzle. Made with love. In India.
Be the first to know when a new template drops
h2: Stay updated on new template and feature releases.
p: Do I need a software to edit these templates ?

Editing and sharing is super simple—just like filling a form. Add names, family details, events, photos, and links, and you’re ready to go. Most couples finish in just 10–20 minutes.
What happens after I buy the template?
After you buy a template, you’ll get a “Remix” link by email. Click it to open the template in Framer. Sign up for a free account, and the template will be added to your workspace—ready to customize.

After you buy a template, you’ll get a 'Template' link with a tutorial by email. Click it to open the template in Framer. Sign up for a free account, and the template will be added to your workspace—ready to customize.
Can I purchase now and use it later ?
Yes. You can purchase now and use it anytime in the future.
Can I purchase it using my phone ?
Yes. You can purchase the template from any device and edit it on laptop using the link which will be sent to you on your email.
Will I need to buy a domain name?
Short Answer: No need. Framer gives you a free web link (like anshwedsneha.framer.website). But if you want your own .com, that’s optional.
How do I add my details in the template?
Simply follow the step-by-step video guide included with your purchase. In short—click on any text to edit, or on a photo to upload your own. That’s it!
YES - The template allows you to add any music of your choice as an .MP3 file

- Tutorial: Step-by-step video guide for easy editing
- Event Cards: Customisable cards for bride & groom families
- Custom Pages: Separate invite pages for each event
- Photo Highlight: Showcase your pre-wedding shoot beautifully
- Instant Edits: Update anytime, even after sharing
- Smart Links: Built-in RSVP, venue maps & Instagram updates
- Accessibility: Elder-friendly, no tiny text like WhatsApp videos
- Information: Space for hashtag, parking, staff stay & more
- Animations: Smooth scrolling effects to bring invites alive
- God Motif: Lord Ganesha motif with an editable mantra option
- Responsive: Works on laptop, tablet & phone seamlessly
- Music: Upload any muisc of your choice
Do I need to know coding to use this?
Short Answer: Not at all. If you can use Canva or Instagram, you’ll find Framer as easy.
How do I share this with my guests?
Short Answer: Once done, you get a simple link. Share it on WhatsApp, text, email — anything works.
How do my guests view the invite?
Like they view any website—on their phone's browser, Safari, Chrome or whatever. It opens beautifully like a website on any device.
What if you want to invite someone to just one event?
The template comes with separate invites for each event—so if you only want to invite your distant bua to the Engagement and not to the Wedding, you absolutely can!
Can I preview before I share it?
Short Answer: Yes! Framer lets you preview everything on mobile and desktop before going live.
Can I make changes after sharing?
Short Answer: Absolutely. Change anything — venue, timings, any link — even after it’s published, and it updates for everyone instantly, no need to re-share the invite.
No - We don’t make custom invites. Please tap the link in bio to buy a template of your choice.

Because this is a digital product, all sales are final and non-refundable. Please review the details carefully before purchasing. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us before placing your order.
Need any help ? We've got your back.

The template has an easy provision to create as many event combinations as you need. That way you'll be able to call separate guests to separate events.

/invites-for-preview/mountains.title: Mountain – Indian Wedding Invitation Website Template
/invites-for-preview/mountains.description: A modern wedding invite that opens as a website. Customize instantly, add photos, and share with guests on WhatsApp. Perfect for every ceremony.
p: Smt. Lata Devi & Sm. Kamal Kapoor
You to join us in the wedding celebrations of

We are both so delighted that you are able to join us in celebrating what we hope will be one of the happiest days of our lives. The affection shown to us by so many people since our roka has been incredibly moving, and has touched us both deeply. We would like to take this opportunity to thank everyone most sincerely for their kindness. We are looking forward to see you at the wedding functions.
To help you feel at ease and enjoy every moment of the celebrations, we’ve gathered a few thoughtful details we’d love for you to know before the big day.
While posting photos on social media please use the hashtag - #BadriKiDulhania
It will be mostly cloudy with temperature reaching up to 22 degrees at the venue
We recommend the nearby lodge called Amba Valley near the venue for the staff members
Valet parking for all our guests will be available at the venue
Click the link to open Instagram
Mittal family is excited that you are able to join us in celebrating what we hope will be one of the happiest days of our lives.
